dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; hawkee.com]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, April 25, 2006 4:36 PM
To: raul@netenforcers.com; Copyright
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; hawkee.com]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; hawkee.com
Date:         Tue, 25 Apr 2006 16:01:58 -0400
From:         Raul Torres <raul@netenforcers.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <copyright@theplanet.com>,
<legal-response@theplanet.com>





To Whom It May Concern:



Please find attached a copy of the Terry N. Silverman Digital Millennium
Copyright Act Notification made out to the ISP,* ThePlanet.com Internet
Services, Inc*, regarding your client, *hawkee.com*. We have enforced
the website and found it to be illegally hosting *Sony Home Video*
intellectual property. A DMCA notice was also sent to the infringer.



Per DMCA policy, if the infringer refuses to comply within the period we
have provided, as the ISP you are required to enforce this policy and
either disable the material or shutdown the website. Please let me know
if any issues arise therein. You may contact me via email at
raul@netenforcers.com <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com>.



Feel free to ask any questions regarding this case.



Thank you for your attention to this matter.



Sincerely,

Raul Torres

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc.

raul@netenforcers.com <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com>

compliance.management@netenforcers.com
<mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com>

The Online Enforcement Experts......
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.




--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
dmca.principal_name: Net Enforcers Inc. (on behalf of Sony)
